history.proof: unfold minus, plus, opp. rewrite scal_distr_r. scongruence use: scal_opp_l unfold: plus, opp.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of scal_distr_r (scal (plus _ _) _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of scal_opp_r (scal _ (opp _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of scal_opp_r (scal _ (opp _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment K : Ring V : ModuleSpace K x, y : K u : V Unable to unify "AbelianGroup.plus V (AbelianGroup.class V) (scal x u) (AbelianGroup.opp V (AbelianGroup.class V) (scal y u))" with "plus (scal x u) (scal (AbelianGroup.opp K (AbelianGroup.class K) y) u)".

original: unfold minus, plus, opp. rewrite scal_distr_r. rewrite scal_distr_r. rewrite scal_opp_r. rewrite scal_opp_r. reflexivity.
